name: 冒险之路(Adventure Road)
description: A global service, real-time combat Strategy Role-Playing online games(SRPG).
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7,windows8,windows10 Processor: 1GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows7,windows8,windows10 Processor: 3.4GHZ Memory: 8 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
